summary: Diff adds a Valentine prompt/success UI with an evasive "No" button hook and romantic styling, but it does not show the required generated image asset under frontend/public, and it introduces backend and authentication/actor wiring changes that were explicitly out of scope / constrained.

missing_requirements.reason: The App.tsx prompt portion that would contain the exact main question and the Yes/No buttons is truncated in the diff, so the presence of the exact on-page question and both button labels cannot be verified from the provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend changed/added despite requirement to implement without backend changes (added an empty Motoko actor).
